summary: "West Side Story" is a famous musical inspired by Romeo and Juliet. It's about two rival gangs, the Jets and the Sharks, in 1950s New York. The Jets are white, and the Sharks are from Puerto Rico. Tony, a Jet, falls in love with Maria, the sister of the Shark leader. Their love story has a dark twist and shows the problems in society at the time. The musical has great music, dancing, and important messages. It was very popular on Broadway and has been made into movies that won many awards.
title: West Side Story
